C. Select three upper-division courses from one emphasis.

child.name: List of emphases can be found: https://catalogue.uci.edu/schoolofhumanities/undergraduateprograminglobalcultures/globalcultures_minor/#emphasestext

name: D. Select one upper-division course from a second emphasis.

child.name: List of emphases can be found: https://catalogue.uci.edu/schoolofhumanities/undergraduateprograminglobalcultures/globalcultures_minor/#emphasestext

A minimum of four upper-division courses required for the minor must be completed successfully at UCI. Two of the four may be taken through the UC Education Abroad Program, providing course content is approved in advance by the appropriate department chair.
